skills.skill: Primavera, Aspen In-Plant Cost Estimator, SharePoint, MS Access

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute capital and expense projects according to appropriate Engineering Standards.
Manage the development and evaluation of all appropriate PSI and PSM documentation.
Facilitate the preparation and control of project scope, justification, economic analysis, schedule, construction, and management execution.
Coordinate activities of the integrated project team from various departments.
Gather and assemble the approval documentation for project authorization.
Interface with Field Construction Representative to ensure project execution and safety policies are consistently followed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (any discipline) with 5+ years of experience in project management. Knowledge of industry design codes and practices, safe design practices, process safety, and personnel safety management (PSM).
